Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Southbound Reroute near Pulaski/Jackson
ShortDescription: Southbound 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Madison, Hamlin, Congress and Pulaski: due to street blockage near Pulaski/Jackson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Madison, Hamlin, Congress and Pulaski: due to street blockage near Pulaski/Jackson.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
